Christian Kojo Bosso

Full Stack Engineer

About me

Welcome, Am Chris a full-stack software engineer, an artificial intelligence and data enthusiast from Ghana.

I enjoy building software that makes a positive difference in the lives of people, software that put smiles on the face of people. I have been working on production/ enterprise web and mobile applications since 2016. I enjoy playing chess and other tactical strategic games if am not programming on my computer.

I see myself as a creator, problem solver and envisage to do great things as such, so, do you have a project, idea or problem you'd like to discuss? Or you are just looking for a developer; contact me.
